explorer.fileNesting.patterns.pubspec.yaml: .fvmrc, .flutter-plugins, .packages, .dart_tool, .flutter-plugins-dependencies, .metadata, .packages, pubspec.lock, build.yaml, analysis_options.yaml, all_lint_rules.yaml, flutter_native_splash.yaml, l10n.yaml, package_rename_config.yaml
explorer.fileNesting.patterns.readme.*: authors, backers.md, spec.md, architecture.md, changelog*, citation*, code_of_conduct.md, codeowners, contributing.md, contributors, copying, credits, governance.md, history.md, license*, maintainers, readme*, security.md, sponsors.md
